shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the video size or rotation of a specified user changes.

p.codeblock: public void onVideoSizeChanged(int uid, int width, int height, int rotation) {}
onVideoSizeChanged?(connection: RtcConnection, uid: number, width: number, height: number, rotation: number): void;
public virtual void OnVideoSizeChanged(RtcConnection connection, uint uid, int width, int height, int rotation) {}
onVideoSizeChanged?( connection: RtcConnection, uid: number, width: number, height: number, rotation: number ): void;
final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int uid, int width, int height, int rotation)? onVideoSizeChanged;

plentry.pd: The ID of the user whose video size or rotation changes. (The uid for the local user is 0. The video is the local user's video preview).

plentry.props: android cpp unity flutter electron rn
android cpp unity flutter electron rn

plentry.pd: New rotation of the video [0 to 360).
